definitions.body: :Is 51:5, cf. infr. arm, shoulder, strength (NH id.; As. (Tel el Amarna:102, 1. 12, etc.) zurû, cf. Jastrow:JBL. xi, 1892, 123; Ar. d-ira09un; Aram. [[דְּרָעָא]], dro9o0; Eth. mazru9t:)—abs. [[זְרוֹעַ]] Ex 6:6 +, [[זְרׂעַ]] De 7:19 +; cstr. [[זְרוֹעַ]] Ps 10:15 +, [[זְרׂעַ]] Ps 89:11 +; sf. [[זְרוֹעִי]] Je 27:5, Ps 89:2, [[זְרׂעִי]] Is 51:5, Is 63:5; [[זְרוֹעֲךָ]] Ps 71:18 +, [[זְרׂעֲךָ]] 1Sa 3:31 +, etc.; pl. [[זְרׂעִים]] Da 11:31; cstr. [[זְרׂעֵי]] Ge 49:24; sf. [[זְרׂעַי]] Is 51:5, [[זְרׂעָיו]] 2Ki 9:24; elsewh. fem. form, cstr. [[זְרוֹעוֹת]] Ps 37:17, [[זְרׂעוֹת]] Job 22:9 + 6 t., [[זְרׂעׂת]] De 33:27; sf. [[זְרוֹעׂתָָי]] Ps 18:35, [[זְרׂעׂתָָי]] 2Sa 22:35, etc. (In abs. and cstr. sg. more oft. plene, in pl. and c. sf. more oft. defect. In three instances where ´[[ז]] is masculine it means a political or military force Da 11:15, Da 11:22, Da 11:31).—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., of a man Ju Jdg 15:14, Jdg 16:12, 2Sa 1:10, Is 9:19, Is 17:5 (prob. acc. instr.), De 33:20, Zec 11:17, Zec 11:17, Ct So 8:6, Da 10:6; Ez 13:30 (del. Co); [[כּׂחוֹ]] ´[[ז]] Is 44:12 (of a smith, forging); [[חֲשׂוּפָה]] ´[[ז]] Ez Eze 4:7 (of prophet); in fig. of ´[[י]] teaching Ephr. to walk Ho 11:3; [[זְרׂעֵי יׇדָיו]] Ge 49:24 arms of his hands, i.e. arms that by their strength enable him (Joseph) to draw the bow; [[וַיַּח אֶת־יְהוֹרָם בֵּין זְרׂעָיו]] 2Ki 9:24, i.e. his arms seen from behind, his shoulders.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: human 1Sa 2:31, 1Sa 2:31 (LXX rd. [[זַרְעֲךָ]] and [[זֶרַע]], but v. Klo Dr), Ez Eze 22:6, Eze 31:17; [[וַתְּאַמֵּץ זְרוֹעתֶיהָ]] Pr 31:17; [[בָּשָׂר]] ´[[ז]] 2Ch 32:8; [[שָׁם בָּשָׂר זְרׂעוֹ]] Je 17:5 (‖[[יִבְטַח]] [[בָּאָדָם]]); cf. Ps 44:4 (‖[[חַרְבָּם]]); [[אישׁ זרוע]] Job 22:8; [[זְרׂעוֹת יְתׂמִים]] Job 22:9 (i.e. strength, resources); [[הָיוּ זרוע לִבְּנֵי־לוֹט]] Ps 83:9; [[רַבִּים]] ´[[ז]] Job 35:9; [[זְרׂעַ גְּדוֹלָה]] Ez Eze 17:9 (for pulling up a tree, in metaph.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = divine strength Ps 71:18 (‖[[גְּבוּרָה]]), [[זְרׂעוֹ משְׁלָה]] [[לוֹ]] Is 40:10 (‖[[חָזׇק]]); [[זְרׂעַי עַמִּים יִשְׁפָּׂטוּ]] Is 51:5 [Str thinks masc. to avoid verbal ending [[נׇה]], cf. Is 49:11]; and help Is 33:2 (‖[[יְשׁוּעָה]]) cf. Is 59:16, Is 63:5; see also Is 53:1.
Pl. forces, political and military, c. [[יִעֲמָׂדוּ]] Da 11:15, Da 11:31; v:Da 11:22 (see Bev).
Shoulder of animal sacrificed, belonging to priest Nu 6:19 (P) De 18:3.
